title: Sid Meier's Civilization® VII Deluxe to Founders Edition Upgrade
description: Sid Meier's Civilization® VII Deluxe to Founders Edition Upgrade entitles digital in-game content! This Edition includes: Right to Rule Collection, Founders Content Pack
longDescription:
# Sid Meier's Civilization® VII Deluxe to Founders Edition Upgrade entitles digital in-game content!

This Edition includes:
• Right to Rule Collection*, with post-launch content featuring 2 new leaders, 4 new civilizations, 4 new Wonders, and a special cosmetic bonus!
• Founders Content Pack, which includes:
— 2 leader personas: Himiko, High Shaman and Ashoka, World Conqueror
— 4 profile customizations
— 1 Fog of War tile set
— 1 Founders palace skin

# RIGHT TO RULE COLLECTION

Explore new possibilities for your personalized empire with even more post-launch add-on content, including 2 new Leaders, 4 new Civilizations, 4 new Wonders, a special cosmetic bonus, and more! Full details will be revealed at a later date.

# FOUNDERS CONTENT PACK 

2 leader personas
Add the Himiko, High Shaman and Ashoka, World Conqueror personas to your collection! These personas offer a new variant of the respective leader, including a different outfit and background, plus a new Unique Ability and Agenda that reflects a different side of their personality!

4 Profile Customizations
Embellish your player profile with these cosmetic customizations, including a striking new Badge, a regal new Title, an ornate new Banner, and an eye-catching new Portrait that will all make you stand out from other players!

1 Fog of War Tile Set
Change your gameplay landscape with a beautiful Fog of War tile set!

1 Alternate Scout Skin
Give your Scout recon units a brand new look with this cosmetic outfit!

1 Founders Palace Skin
Give your Civ's Palace a regal new look with a glorious remodel that's sure to stand out!

*The Right To Rule Collection is included in the Founders Editions of Civilization VII. Contains 6 DLCs, all of which will be available on or by September 2025 (subject to change). Each DLC will be delivered automatically in-game on release. Terms apply.
